item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "You can always count on a murderer for a fancy prose style." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Brittanyvetter add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Our life is frittered away by detail. Simplify, simplify." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I say, beware of all enterprises that require new clothes, and not rather a new wearer of clothes." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "There is a time in every man's education when he arrives at the conviction that envy is ignorance; that imitation is suicide; that he must take himself for better, for worse, as his portion; that though the wide universe is full of good, no kernel of nourishing corn can come to him but through his toil bestowed on that plot of ground which is given to him to till. The power which resides in him is new in nature, and none but he knows what that is which he can do, nor does he know until he has tried." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Brittanyvetter add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description:
"You fit into me like a hook into an eye
a fish hook an open eye" -- Margaret Atwood
